name: The Cocktail Society - Blundr
description:
Trigger Warning
This game is made to raise awareness for members of the LGBTQ+ community and the ways that are okay and NOT okay to respond to their sexualities/gender identities/relationship statuses/etc. Some parts of the dialogue in this game may be offensive to some players and possibly triggering. Some triggers include; transphobia, gendered language, misgendering, homophobia, acephobia, biphobia and anti-polyamory. If you feel this may not be a good experience for you, please do not play it.
-The Cocktail Societ

We decided to make 'Blundr' in order to represent and shine a light on how to be more inclusive and respectful towards members of the LGBTQ+ community. The idea came about from most of our members relating to 'bi invisibility' where they felt like they didn't exist to certain parts of varies communities, including the LGBTQ+ community. We took that idea and spread it to several marginalised groups within the community to show players better and worse ways to respond to someone when talking about their sexualities and gender identities.
